member.name: T:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IContact
member.summary: Contact information for the exposed API.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IContact.Name
member.summary: The identifying name of the contact person/organization.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IContact.Url
member.summary: The URL pointing to the contact information.MUST be in the format of a URL.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IContact.Email
member.summary: The email address of the contact person/organization.MUST be in the format of an email address.

member.name: T:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IInfo
member.summary: The object provides metadata about the API. The metadata MAY be used by the clients if needed, and MAY be presented in editing or documentation generation tools for convenience.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IInfo.Title
member.summary: REQUIRED. The title of the application.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IInfo.Description
member.summary: A short description of the application.CommonMark syntax MAY be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IInfo.TermsOfService
member.summary: A URL to the Terms of Service for the API.MUST be in the format of a URL.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IInfo.Contact
member.summary: Contact Object The contact information for the exposed API.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IInfo.License
member.summary: License Object The license information for the exposed API.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IInfo.Version
member.summary: REQUIRED. The version of the OpenAPI document (which is distinct from the OpenAPI Specification version or the API implementation version).

member.name: T:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.ILicense
member.summary: License information for the exposed API.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.ILicense.Name
member.summary: REQUIRED.The license name used for the API.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.ILicense.Url
member.summary: A URL to the license used for the API. MUST be in the format of a URL.

member.name: T:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IOpenAPI
member.summary: This is the root document object of the OpenAPI document.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IOpenAPI.OpenAPI
member.summary: REQUIRED. This string MUST be the semantic version number of the OpenAPI Specification version that the OpenAPI document uses. The openapi field SHOULD be used by tooling specifications and clients to interpret the OpenAPI document. This is not related to the API info.version string.

member.name: P:SolidRpc.Json.OpenApi.V3.IOpenAPI.Info
member.summary: REQUIRED. Provides metadata about the API. The metadata MAY be used by tooling as required.
